_exec_summary.SummaryText:
American Warehouses, Ltd. is primarily an industrial warehouse with a small amount of hazardous chemicals located in Houston, Texas. American Warehouses was established in 1948 and has not had any significant fire spill or problem that has affected our employees or any offsite location nor the surrounding community. We have not had a release to the environment and the largest single vessel we store is a 275 gallon tote. In 1997, we invested over $500,000 in upgrading our sprinkler system and buildings to meet existing NFPA and City of Houston building code requirements. Security and Responsible Care are just two of the items that American Warehouses takes very seriously and we are very proud of our record. Our customers trust us to take care of their products and make sure everything is safe while under our custody.

Security, both internally and externally, is handled from a number of angles at American Warehouses. These measures include infrared cameras, entry alarms, motion detectors and fire alarms that are monitored 24 hours a day by ADT Security. We also have an excellent relationship with the Houston Police and Fire Departments.
American Warehouses chemical services include industrial product distribution, as well as hazardous materials, which are handled by our certified hazardous materials team. Our chemical facilities are H3 and H7 rated respectively. Each of our staff members are fully trained to ensure compliance with local, state and federal regulations. American Warehouses is one of the first 3PL's to comply with the most comprehensive rulings of HM-126, HM-181 and HM-232.
At American Warehouses we take pride in having an on site hazardous material response company. Oil Mop, LLC is dedicated to the highest level of professionalism and preparation in providing unrivaled Hazardous Material Emergence Response Services to its customers. 
American Warehouses is committed to the safety of our employees, our community and our customers.
